alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Klamath (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 5:09PM PDT until May 19 at 6:00PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: The National Weather Service in Medford has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Jackson County in southwestern Oregon... West central Klamath County in south central Oregon... * Until 600 PM PDT. * At 508 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Rocky Point Upper Klamath Lake, or 22 miles northwest of Klamath Falls, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Fourmile Lake Campground, Mount Mcloughlin Trailhead, Great Meadow Snow Park, Rocky Point Upper Klamath Lake, Malone Springs and Highway 140 Near Lake Of The Woods. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
